title: Premarket Mover: Microsoft Corp (MSFT) Up 1.08%
text:
Microsoft Corp (MSFT) has risen Friday morning, with the stock adding 1.08% in pre-market trading to 408.15. 


MSFT's short-term technical score of 96 indicates that the stock has traded more bullishly over the last month than 96% of stocks on the market. In the Software - Infrastructure industry, which ranks 49 out of 146 industries, Microsoft Corp ranks higher than 97% of stocks.

Microsoft Corp has risen 8.87% over the past month, closing at $367.75 on January 5. During this period of time, the stock fell as low as $367.75 and as high as $415.32. MSFT has an average analyst recommendation of Strong Buy. The company has an average price target of $421.75.





 MSFT has an Overall Score of 75. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on MSFT!
See Full MSFT Report



Microsoft Corp has a Long-Term Technical rank of 86. This means that trading over the last 200 trading days has placed the company in the upper half of stocks with 14% of the market scoring higher. In the Software - Infrastructure industry which is number 47 by this metric, MSFT ranks better than 47% of stocks.



Important Dates for Investors in MSFT:


-Microsoft Corp is set to release earnings on 2024-04-29. Over the last 12 months, the company has reported EPS of $10.33.


-Microsoft Corp has a dividend yield of 0.007545651 with their ex-dividend date set for 2/14/2024.
